author: Ervin
title: Comment on The 20 Hottest Photos of Jennifer Lopez by Ervin
text: The 20 Hottest Photos of Jennifer Lopez Published Share Tweet Follow Bronx native Jennifer Lopez made a splash in the music scene and Hollywood with a number of hit songs and major titles credited to her name (not to mention her new role on American Idol). But beyond a multi-talented performer, she's considered to be one of the most beautiful women gracing the screen and stage.
